verses.roman:
kata dine prabhu citte karilā cintana
gṛhastha ha-ilāma, ebe cāhi gṛha-dharma

synonyms: kata dine—after some days; prabhu—the Lord; citte—within His mind; karilā—made; cintana—consideration; gṛhastha ha-ilāma—I remained in householder life; ebe—now; cāhi—I want; gṛha-dharma—activities of family life.
translation: After some days the Lord thought, "I did not take sannyāsa, and since I am remaining at home it is My duty to act as a gṛhastha.
